pages.text: The Soul Steel Ingot is one of the most important crafting items in Reaped. It is used not only in the Soul Steel Scythe, but also in Spirit Boxes.
Above is the crafting recipe to acquire your initial Soul Steel Ingots.
Above is the crafting recipe to acquire Soul Steel Ingots if you happen to already have Soul Steel Nuggets.
Once you finally acquire some souls, they can be used to craft Soul Steel Ingots directly in a slightly cheaper recipe.
